CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Planting_or_Sowing_Date__c) || ISBLANK(Estimated_Harvesting_Date__c), 0, IF( Estimated_Harvesting_Date__c <= Planting_or_Sowing_Date__c, 0, MAX( 0, MIN( 1, (TODAY() - Planting_or_Sowing_Date__c) / (Estimated_Harvesting_Date__c - Planting_or_Sowing_Date__c) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Percentage Progress
